item.title: Schneider Electric ClearSCADA
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an input validation vulnerability in Schneider Electric's ClearSCADA.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric Wonderware Intelligence
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a credentials management vulnerability in Schneider Electric's Wonderware Intelligence software.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Eaton xComfort Ethernet Communication Interface
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an improper access controls vulnerability in the Eaton xComfort Ethernet Communication Interface.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric Conext ComBox
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a resource exhaustion vulnerability in Schneider Electric’s Conext ComBox solar battery monitor.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens SINUMERIK Integrate and SINUMERIK Operate
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a man-in-the-middle vulnerability in the Siemens SINUMERIK Integrate and SINUMERIK Operate.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens RUGGEDCOM NMS
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for cross-site request forgery and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities in the Siemens RUGGEDCOM NMS.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: VIPA Controls WinPLC7
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in VIPA Controls' WinPLC7.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Red Lion Controls Sixnet-Managed Industrial Switches, AutomationDirect STRIDE-Managed Ethernet Switches Vulnerability
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability in Red Lion Controls' Sixnet-Managed Industrial Switches and AutomationDirect's STRIDE-Managed Ethernet Switches.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric Modicon M340 PLC
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a resource exhaustion vulnerability in Schneider Electric's Modicon M340 PLC.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Advantech WebAccess
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a DLL hijacking vulnerability in Advantech's WebAccess.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Geutebrück IP Cameras
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for authentication bypass and improper neutralization of special elements vulnerabilities in Geutebrück IP cameras.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens SIMATIC Authentication Bypass
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an authentication bypass in Siemens' SIMATIC.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Hanwha Techwin Smart Security Manager
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation detail for remote code execution vulnerabilities in Hanwha Techwin's Smart Security Manager.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Sielco Sistemi Winlog SCADA Software
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an uncontrolled search path vulnerability in Sielco Sistemi's Winlog SCADA Software.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: BD Alaris 8000 Insufficiently Protected Credentials Vulnerability
item.description: This advisory was originally posted to the NCCIC Portal on January 17, 2017, and is being released to the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This advisory contains mitigation details for an insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability in BD’s Alaris 8000 Point of Care unit, which provides a common user interface for programming intravenous infusions.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: BD Alaris 8015 Insufficiently Protected Credentials Vulnerabilities
item.description: This advisory was originally posted to the NCCIC Portal on January 17, 2017, and is being released to the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This advisory contains mitigation details for protected credentials vulnerabilities in BD’s Alaris 8015 Point of Care unit, which provides a common user interface for programming intravenous infusions.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Honeywell XL Web II Controller Vulnerabilities
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for vulnerabilities in Honeywell’s XL Web II controller application.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: BINOM3 Electric Power Quality Meter (Update A)
item.description: This updated advisory is a follow-up to the original advisory titled ICSA-17-031-01 BINOM3 Electric Power Quality Meter that was published January 31, 2017, on the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This updated advisory contains mitigation details for vulnerabilities in BINOM3's electric power quality meter.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Ecava IntegraXor
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an SQL injection vulnerability in the Ecava IntegraXor web server.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Eaton ePDU Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a path traversal vulnerability in certain legacy Eaton ePDUs.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document
